Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Kingston

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Division. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Division.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
